A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
That's right folks\, time to move on from your childhood.  This is the NEW Star Wars Galaxy now.

I thought this was what the Force Awakens should've been.  But better late than never.  I've now renewed by 30 year relationship with the franchise and it's never been more exciting than now.  

Want to know why? 

Because for the first time in 30 years\, I have no idea what will happen next.
